title: Minister Lamamra receives three new Ambassadors accredited to Algeria
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and the National Community abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra, received Thursday, three new Ambassadors accredited to Algeria who handed him the copies of their credentials.
They are the Ambassador of Peru, Jorge Eduardo Wurst Calle, the Ambassador of Guinea-Bissau, Mamadu Aliu Jalo and the Ambassador of Bulgaria, Mariana Nicoleva Boyadjeva.

The audiences were an opportunity to discuss the relations of friendship and cooperation that Algeria maintains with each of these three countries and to discuss ways and means of strengthening them in all areas, including through exchanges of high-level visits.
The head of Algerian diplomacy welcomed the three ambassadors, expressing his best wishes for success in their new duties.
